titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6063) to authorize the programs of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-707, by Mr. Hastings (FL).

The rule waives all points of order against consideration of the bill except clauses 9 and 10 of rule XXI. The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Science and Technology now printed in the bill shall be considered as an original bill for the purpose of amendment.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 233.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1257.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - The Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. Lincoln Diaz-Balart demanded the yeas and nays which were ordered, and the Chair postponed further proceedings on the question until a time to be announced.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 183 (Roll no. 405).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 188 (Roll no. 406).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/10/2008--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 6063) to authorize the programs of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration.
